context_for_next_testing_agent: Mission v9.4.4 LIBERTÉ VISUELLE TOTALE verified. Key features: (1) Backend ConceptConfig now includes backgroundColor and glowColor fields with proper defaults. (2) API PUT /api/concept correctly accepts and persists all 4 color fields. (3) index.css defines 4 CSS variables: --primary-color (#D91CD2), --secondary-color (#8b5cf6), --background-color (#000000), --glow-color (rgba). (4) CoachDashboard has 4 color pickers with proper data-testid attributes. (5) 6 quick presets include background and glow colors (Afroboost Classic, Blanc Élégant, Bleu Ocean, Or Luxe, Vert Nature, Rouge Passion). (6) Reset button properly resets all 4 colors to defaults. (7) ANTI-REGRESSION: Chat button remains violet (#D91CD2, rgb(217, 28, 210)). Dashboard UI testing requires Google OAuth authentication.

BACKEND_SCHEMA.concept_model: Includes backgroundColor and glowColor with defaults
BACKEND_SCHEMA.concept_update: Includes Optional fields for backgroundColor and glowColor
BACKEND_SCHEMA.api_put_concept: Accepts and persists all 4 color fields

dashboard_color_pickers.note: Dashboard requires Google OAuth authentication - code structure verified
